title: real-estate
longDesc: Real Estate project is a responsive web application built using React.js and powered by a firebase database. It allows users to explore real estate listings, view property details, and connect with sellers. Features include: Responsive Design, Listings, Authentication and Authorization and smooth navigation
prjDesc: Real Estate project is a responsive web application built using React.js and powered by a firebase database. It allows users to explore real estate listings, view property details, and connect with sellers. Features include: Responsive Design, Listings, Authentication and Authorization and smooth navigation

title: ecommerce
prjDesc: Technology stack: React.js, Router-Dom, Pagination, React Hooks, SASS. Key features: Responsive design, Product Listing to display a curated collection of products, User interface components, Shopping bag functionality including: adding Items, Removing Items, Quantity Management, Total Price calculation.
longDesc: Technology stack: React.js, Router-Dom, Pagination, React Hooks, SASS. Key features: Responsive design, Product Listing to display a curated collection of products, User interface components, Shopping bag functionality including: adding Items, Removing Items, Quantity Management, Total Price calculation.

title: Portfolio
prjDesc: My portfolio project is built using Next.js and TypeScript, making it both efficient and type-safe. With responsive design implemented using SCSS, it adapts seamlessly to various screen sizes. I've deployed it on Vercel for easy access and scalability.
longDesc: My portfolio project is built using Next.js and TypeScript, making it both efficient and type-safe. With responsive design implemented using SCSS, it adapts seamlessly to various screen sizes. I've deployed it on Vercel for easy access and scalability.

title: Handover-App
prjDesc: MERN stack project, MongoDB, Express, React and Node.js. Features: CRUD Operations, Different Access types (manager, Admin, Employee), Authentication and Authorization, Filters for Search Option, Pagination, Responsive Design, Deployment (firebase for static part, Heroku for backend)
longDesc: MERN stack project, MongoDB, Express, React and Node.js. Features: CRUD Operations, Different Access types (manager, Admin, Employee), Authentication and Authorization, Filters for Search Option, Pagination, Responsive Design, Deployment (firebase for static part, Heroku for backend)
